text: wala junaha ʿalaykum fima ʿarradtum bihi min khit'bati l-nisai aw aknantum fi anfusikum ʿalima l-lahu annakum satadhkurunahunna walakin la tuwaʿiduhunna sirran illa an taqulu qawlan maʿrufan wala taʿzimu ʿuq'data l-nikahi hatta yablugha l-kitabu ajalahu wa-iʿ'lamu anna l-laha yaʿlamu ma fi anfusikum fa-ih'dharuhu wa-iʿ'lamu anna l-laha ghafurun halimun
